title: Bitcoin_Arena
author: Bitcoin_Arena
content: What happened:  bitamp.co.uk and bitamp.app copycat sites designed just like the genuine site bitamp.com and the intention is to phish for people's sign in credentials and seeds for their Bitamp accountsScammers Profile Link:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3557606Reference Link:  https://ninjastic.space/post/62307270Amount Scammed:  N.AAdditional Notes: Both bitamp.co.uk and bitamp.app are the exact copy of bitamp.comFake site: bitamp.co.ukCode:Domain:bitamp.co.ukRegistrar:Namecheap, Inc. [Tag = NAMECHEAP-INC]Registered On:2023-05-26Expires On:2024-05-26Updated On:2023-05-26Status:Registered until expiry date.Name Servers:dns1.registrar-servers.comdns2.registrar-servers.comFake site: bitamp.appCode:Domain:bitamp.appRegistrar:Namecheap Inc.Registered On:2023-05-08Expires On:2024-05-08Updated On:2023-05-13Status:clientTransferProhibitedName Servers:dns1.namecheaphosting.comdns2.namecheaphosting.comGenuine site: bitamp.comCode:Domain:bitamp.comRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On:2012-08-05Expires On:2030-08-05Updated On:2022-07-09Status:clientTransferProhibitedName Servers:gerardo.ns.cloudflare.comsuzanne.ns.cloudflare.com
